history.proof: intros d p c l H. unfold essence_list, essence. destruct l. - simpl. qauto use: Nat.lt_eq_cases, le_n_S, Nat.add_succ_r, Nat.add_0_r, Nat.le_0_l unfold: lt inv: nat. - destruct p. + qauto depth: 4 l: on use: Nat.lt_succ_r, Nat.pred_succ, Nat.add_lt_mono_r, high_aux_1, borne_2 unfold: Init.Nat.mul, lt. + simpl. hauto lq: on drew: off use: Nat.add_le_mono, Nat.add_1_r, Nat.max_r, le_n_S, Nat.max_l, Nat.le_ge_cases, Nat.le_0_l.

ctx: intros d p c l H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros d p c l H.
apply Nat.le_trans with (m:= S (1 + term_high_0 l * S (DTA_taille d))).
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

ctx: intros d p c l H.
apply Nat.le_trans with (m:= S (1 + term_high_0 l * S (DTA_taille d))).
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet * is not finished.

original: intros d p c l H. unfold essence_list, essence. destruct l. - simpl. apply le_n. - destruct p. + simpl. apply Nat.le_trans with (m:= S (1 + term_high_0 l * S (DTA_taille d))). * apply Nat.le_refl. * apply Nat.mul_le_mono_l. apply Nat.le_add_r. + simpl. apply le_n.
